bibl.note: The analysis of the later Ptolemaic water-clock fragments indicates that they also timed civil night. The Ptolemaic outflow water-clocks were basically the same as the earliest known water-clock described in Amenemhet's epitaph.
bibl.seg: Cotterell B., F.P. Dickson and J. Kamminga, Ancient Egyptian Water-Clocks: A Reappraisal.

The analysis of the later Ptolemaic water-clock fragments indicates that they also timed civil night. The Ptolemaic outflow water-clocks were basically the same as the earliest known water-clock described in Amenemhet's epitaph.
